content.raw:
[UNIT_Exception_TEST is failing](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/493/testReport/(root)/Exception/GZASSERT_Enabled_ThrowAssertion/) on OS X consistently. Here is the console output:

~~~
55: [ RUN      ] Exception.GZASSERT_Enabled_ThrowAssertion
55:
55: [WARNING] /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest-death-test.cc:825:: Death tests use fork(), which is unsafe particularly in a threaded context. For this test, Google Test detected 2 threads.
55: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/gazebo/common/Exception_TEST.cc:81: Failure
55: Death test: (__builtin_expect(!((true == false)&&("Assert thrown")), 0) ? __assert_rtn(__func__, "/Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/gazebo/common/Exception_TEST.cc", 80, "(true == false)&&(\"Assert thrown\")") : (void)0)
55:     Result: died but not with expected error.
55:   Expected: .*Internal Program Error - assertion.*
55: Actual msg:
55: [  DEATH   ] Assertion failed: ((true == false)&&("Assert thrown")), function TestBody, file /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/gazebo/common/Exception_TEST.cc, line 80.
55: [  DEATH   ] 
55: [  FAILED  ] Exception.GZASSERT_Enabled_ThrowAssertion (15162 ms)
~~~

On trusty, the console output looks like this:
~~~
55: [ RUN      ] Exception.GZASSERT_Enabled_ThrowAssertion
55:
55: [WARNING] /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest-death-test.cc:825:: Death tests use fork(), which is unsafe particularly in a threaded context. For this test, Google Test couldn't detect the number of threads.
55: [       OK ] Exception.GZASSERT_Enabled_ThrowAssertion (1166 ms)
~~~
content.html:
UNIT_Exception_TEST is failing on OS X consistently. Here is the console output:

55: [ RUN      ] Exception.GZASSERT_Enabled_ThrowAssertion
55:
55: [WARNING] /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest-death-test.cc:825:: Death tests use fork(), which is unsafe particularly in a threaded context. For this test, Google Test detected 2 threads.
55: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/gazebo/common/Exception_TEST.cc:81: Failure
55: Death test: (__builtin_expect(!((true == false)&&("Assert thrown")), 0) ? __assert_rtn(__func__, "/Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/gazebo/common/Exception_TEST.cc", 80, "(true == false)&&(\"Assert thrown\")") : (void)0)
55:     Result: died but not with expected error.
55:   Expected: .*Internal Program Error - assertion.*
55: Actual msg:
55: [  DEATH   ] Assertion failed: ((true == false)&&("Assert thrown")), function TestBody, file /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/gazebo/common/Exception_TEST.cc, line 80.
55: [  DEATH   ] 
55: [  FAILED  ] Exception.GZASSERT_Enabled_ThrowAssertion (15162 ms)

On trusty, the console output looks like this:

55: [ RUN      ] Exception.GZASSERT_Enabled_ThrowAssertion
55:
55: [WARNING] /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/gtest/src/gtest-death-test.cc:825:: Death tests use fork(), which is unsafe particularly in a threaded context. For this test, Google Test couldn't detect the number of threads.
55: [       OK ] Exception.GZASSERT_Enabled_ThrowAssertion (1166 ms)
